title: The First Breath
imgSmText: Two ER doctors clash over methods while fighting to save lives.
imgText: In a high-pressure urban emergency room, two brilliant but stubborn surgeons, one old-school and one innovative, must overcome their differences when a major crisis overwhelms the hospital.

title: Nightingale's Oath
imgSmText: A veteran nurse mentors a reckless new intern, testing her patience.
imgText: A seasoned ICU nurse who has seen it all is paired with a talented but arrogant new resident, forcing her to teach him about compassion as much as medicine.

title: November 1918
imgSmText: A family struggles to survive and stay together during the Spanish Flu.
imgText: At the end of WWI, a determined young woman must care for her sick family while their small town is quarantined and crumbling under the weight of the deadly pandemic.

title: The Red Earth
imgSmText: A woman returns to her rural Chinese village to confront a family secret.
imgText: A successful lawyer from Shanghai is called back to her ancestral home after her father's death, unearthing a long-buried secret that challenges her identity and future.

title: Jade Dragon
imgSmText: A master potter's legacy is threatened by his ambitious daughter.
imgText: In modern-day Jingdezhen, the 'Porcelain Capital,' a revered artisan's daughter wants to modernize the family business, causing a deep rift with her tradition-bound father.

title: The Crown's Shadow
imgSmText: A young Queen Elizabeth II navigates her first major constitutional crisis.
imgText: In the early 1950s, the new Queen struggles to forge her identity and authority while managing political turmoil and the towering legacy of her father, King George VI.

title: Echoes in Silence
imgSmText: The sole survivor of a serial killer hunts for answers years later.
imgText: A decade after barely escaping the 'Rose Killer,' a reclusive woman must confront her trauma and work with a skeptical detective when she believes the real culprit is still free.

title: The Anatomy of Evil
imgSmText: A forensic psychiatrist risks everything to understand a serial killer's mind.
imgText: A driven doctor gets unprecedented access to a charming but ruthless murderer, but the closer he gets to the truth, the more his own sanity and safety begin to unravel.

title: Finn
imgSmText: A young man transitions and navigates love and family for the first time.
imgText: Finn's journey of transition is complicated when he meets Leo and falls in love, forcing him to confront his fears of intimacy and reveal his past.

title: Ubuntu
imgSmText: A community health worker fights stigma during the HIV crisis in South Africa.
imgText: In 1990s KwaZulu-Natal, a fierce nurse battles ignorance, poverty, and government indifference to bring care and dignity to those dying from a mysterious new disease.

title: Songlines
imgSmText: An Aboriginal family fights to protect their ancestral land from mining.
imgText: When a mining company threatens their sacred land, a fractured family must heal old wounds and unite, using ancient lore and modern law to save their home and culture.

title: Belfast Grace
imgSmText: A young mother battles addiction in 1980s Troubles-era Northern Ireland.
imgText: Amid the sectarian violence of Belfast, Grace fights her personal demons of addiction while trying to shield her young son from the chaos and poverty that surrounds them.

title: The Last Shift
imgSmText: An aging factory worker's retirement is jeopardized, threatening his family.
imgText: After 40 years on the assembly line, auto worker Joe's pension is cut days before retirement, forcing him to make a desperate choice to save his family's future.

title: The Unseen
imgSmText: A blind pianist rediscovers her music and passion after a personal tragedy.
imgText: After an accident robs her of her sight and her will to play, a former concert pianist is drawn back to music by a talented but troubled student, helping them both heal.

title: The Keeper of Stories
imgSmText: A lonely archivist finds her life changed by the diaries of a WWI nurse.
imgText: Working in a dusty library basement, an isolated woman finds connection through the vivid diaries of a nurse from 1917, inspiring her to finally live her own life.

title: The Last Harvest
imgSmText: An aging farmer battles bankruptcy and a changing climate alone.
imgText: A third-generation farmer faces his most difficult season as debt mounts and his land suffers. He must decide whether to hold onto his legacy or let it go.

title: The Glass Ceiling
imgSmText: A female executive fights for equality in a male-dominated corporation.
imgText: A brilliant VP is passed over for CEO in favor of a less qualified male colleague. She must choose between a quiet severance or a public fight that could end her career.

title: Borrowed Time
imgSmText: A hospice nurse forms a deep bond with her terminally ill patient.
imgText: A dedicated nurse helping a sharp-witted, cynical author live his final days with dignity uncovers a secret from his past that changes her own perspective on life.

title: The Prodigy
imgSmText: A musical genius's ambition strains his relationship with his family.
imgText: A virtuoso violinist is pushed by his demanding teacher and father. As he rises to fame, the pressure threatens to shatter his spirit and his bond with his family.

title: The Crossing
imgSmText: A Syrian refugee risks everything to get his family to Europe.
imgText: A former professor flees Aleppo with his young daughter. Their harrowing journey across the Mediterranean tests the limits of his hope and his will to survive.
